creator: newlenyauser@trapo.it
text:
If i edit group for a new user and press lt without selecting a group i get 
the following error. If i go back and choose a group i get the same 
error..however returning to user and editing groups resolves it.

Message: Failed to execute pipeline.

Description: org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Failed to execute 
pipeline.: org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Exception in 
ServerPagesGenerator.generate(): java.lang.NullPointerException

Sender: org.apache.cocoon.servlet.CocoonServlet

Source: Cocoon Servlet

Request URI

default/admin/users/Trapo/6f73842c464b357a3d5509270e4b3d6a5a55430b.continuation

cause

java.lang.NullPointerException
